org.primaresearch.dla.page.io.xml

Class PageXmlInputOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.io.xml.PageXmlInputOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.primaresearch.io.FormatModelSource

    public class PageXmlInputOutput
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.primaresearch.io.FormatModelSource
    Central access point for reading and writing PAGE XML.

    Note: Page objects can only be saved using the XML format they are set to. Call Page.setFormatVersion to convert the page object to another version if necessary.

    To validate a page object without writing a file call the validate() method of a PageWriter.
    Author:
    clc

      • postProcessPage

        public static void postProcessPage(Page page,
                                   int imageWidth,
                                   int imageHeight,
                                   double dpiHor,
                                   double dpiVert)
        Post-processes the given page object using the specified image dimension and resolution.
        This could include scaling all coordinates if they are not measured in pixel.
        Parameters:
        page - Page object to post-process
        imageWidth - Width of the document image
        imageHeight - Height of the document image
        dpiHor - X resolution of the document image
        dpiVert - Y resolution of the document image
